verses.verse: For I have <S%H5414>taken<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> to my <S%H3820>heart<s%> and <S%H952>explain<s%> it that <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>men,<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>men,<s%> and their <S%H5652>deeds<s%> are in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H120>Man<s%> does not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H1571>whether<s%> [it will be] <S%H160>love<s%> <S%H1571>or<s%> <S%H8135>hatred;<s%> <S%H3605>anything<s%> <S%H6440>awaits<s%> him.

It is the <S%H9201>same<s%> for <S%H3605>all.<s%> There is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4745>fate<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and for the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> for the <S%H2896>good,<s%> for the <S%H2889>clean,<s%> and for the <S%H2931>unclean;<s%> for the man who <S%H2076>offers<s%> a <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> and for the one <S%H834>who<s%> does not <S%H2076>sacrifice.<s%> As the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2896>man<s%> is, so is the <S%H2398>sinner;<s%> as the <S%H7650>swearer<s%> is, <S%H9201>so<s%> is the one who is <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to <S%H7621>swear.<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> is an <S%H7451>evil<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> that there is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4745>fate<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3605>men.<s%> <S%H1571>Furthermore,<s%> the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> are <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H9563>evil,<s%> and <S%H1947>insanity<s%> is in their <S%H3824>hearts<s%> throughout their <S%H9132>lives.<s%> <S%H310>Afterwards<s%> they [go] to the <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

For <S%H4310>whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> is <S%H2266>joined<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>living,<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> is <S%H986>hope;<s%> <S%H3588>surely<s%> a <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H3611>dog<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H9030>lion.<s%>

For the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> they will <S%H4191>die;<s%> but the <S%H4191>dead<s%> do not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3972>anything,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H369>have<s%> they <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> a <S%H7939>reward,<s%> for their <S%H2143>memory<s%> is <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%>

<S%H1571>Indeed<s%> their <S%H160>love,<s%> their <S%H8135>hate,<s%> and their <S%H7068>zeal<s%> have <S%H3528>already<s%> perished, and they will <S%H6>no<s%> <S%H369>longer<s%> <S%H5750>have<s%> a <S%H369>share<s%> in <S%H2506>all<s%> that is <S%H3605>done<s%> <S%H6213>under<s%> the <S%H8478>sun.<s%>

<S%H1980>Go<s%> [then,] <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H8057>happiness,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> your <S%H3196>wine<s%> with a <S%H2896>cheerful<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H3528>already<s%> <S%H7521>approved<s%> your <S%H4639>works.<s%>
Let your <S%H899>clothes<s%> be <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6256>time,<s%> and let not <S%H8081>oil<s%> be <S%H2637>lacking<s%> on your <S%H7218>head.<s%>

<S%H7200>Enjoy<s%> <S%H9132>life<s%> with the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H1892>fleeting<s%> <S%H9132>life<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He has <S%H5414>given<s%> to you <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun;<s%> for <S%H1931>this<s%> is your <S%H2506>reward<s%> in <S%H9132>life,<s%> and in your <S%H5999>toil<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6001>labored<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

<S%H3605>Whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4672>finds<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> verily, <S%H6213>do<s%> [it] with all your <S%H3581>might;<s%> for <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4639>activity<s%> or <S%H2803>planning<s%> or knowledge or <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> in <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are <S%H1980>going.<s%>

I <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> that the <S%H4793>race<s%> is not to the <S%H7031>swift,<s%> and the <S%H4421>battle<s%> is not to the <S%H1368>warriors,<s%> and <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H3808><s%> is <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1571><s%> <S%H6239>wealth<s%> to the <S%H995>discerning,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1571><s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> to men of <S%H3045>ability;<s%> for <S%H6256>time<s%> and <S%H6294>chance<s%> <S%H7136>overtake<s%> them <S%H3605>all.<s%>

<S%H3588>Moreover,<s%> <S%H1571><s%> <S%H120>man<s%> does not <S%H3045>know<s%> his <S%H6256>time:<s%> like <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H270>caught<s%> in a <S%H7451>treacherous<s%> <S%H4685>net,<s%> and <S%H6833>birds<s%> <S%H270>trapped<s%> in a <S%H6341>snare,<s%> so the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> are <S%H3369>ensnared<s%> at an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> when it <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> on them.
<S%H1571>Also<s%> <S%H2090>this<s%> I came to <S%H7200>see<s%> as <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and it <S%H1419>impressed<s%> me.

There was a <S%H6996>small<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> with <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> in it and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to it, <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> it, and <S%H1129>constructed<s%> <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H9284>siegeworks<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it.

But there was <S%H4672>found<s%> in it a <S%H4542>poor<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> and he <S%H4422>delivered<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> by his <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%> Yet <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H120>one<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> that <S%H4542>poor<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

So I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2451>"Wisdom<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H1369>strength.<s%>" But the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of the <S%H4542>poor<s%> <S%H4542>man<s%> is <S%H959>despised<s%> and his <S%H1697>words<s%> are not <S%H8085>heeded.<s%>
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H5183>quietness<s%> are [better] <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H2199>shouting<s%> of a <S%H4910>ruler<s%> among <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
